page.title: 10INTERVIEW - HOLIDAY-MAKER 2
page.content: My name is Julia, and I come from Great Harwood. I am here for the weekend with my friend Hariet. Blackpool is O.K. to come for the weekend when the sun is shining, but I prefer to go abroad where the sun is guaranteed. Blackpool also tends to be quite pricey compared to home, and just getting into some of the pubs and clubs is a problem as you are always told you need to be a member. One thing which we like about Blackpool is that it takes less than an hour to get here, so we tend to come here quite often, several times a year in fact - but that is mainly because there is not much to do in Great Harwood.
